id: This is were the name of the plugin is, note that a server can only have one plugin with the same name enabled at a time.
version: 1.0.0 Increase the 1.0.0 every time you make a change
description: A description for the user to use.
files: All the files in this list will be downloaded to the server when the plugin is installed.

input.name: sample
input.description: The input for this will be passed into your function under the settings dictionary with the key 'sample'
